casebody.data:
Edward S. HOPKINS, Plaintiff-Respondent, v. BOSTON & MAINE RAILROAD, Defendant-Appellant. No. 34. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Nov. 6, 1933. Martin Gilligan, of New York City (K. 0. Mott-Smith, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Alfred T. Rowe, of New York City (Sol Gelb, of New York City, of counsel), for respondent.

Before MANTON, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
